text: H: Transmitted to Governor.
S: Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 821).
H: Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 888).
H: Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Belatti, Cochran excused (2).
S: Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1).  Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none.  Noes, 0 (none).  Excused, 1 (Senator(s) McKelvey).
S: 48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 04-30-25
S: Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 132).
H: Forty-eight (48) hours notice Wednesday, 04-30-25.
H: Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 132) as amended in (CD 1).

S: The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 2 Aye(s): Senator(s) Rhoads, Moriwaki; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Awa.

H: The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 3 Ayes: Representative(s) Tarnas, Kitagawa, Shimizu; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.
H: Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Wednesday 04-23-25 2:15PM in conference room 325.
S: Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-22-25 2:00PM; Conference Room 325.
S: Conference committee meeting scheduled for 04-21-25 2:00PM; Conference Room 325.
S: Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 755).
H: House Conferees Appointed: Tarnas, Kitagawa Co-Chairs; Shimizu.
H: Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 788).
S: Senate Conferees Appointed: Rhoads Chair; Moriwaki Co-Chair; Awa.
S: Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 704).
H: House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
H: Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No.  701) in amended form (SD 1).
S: Report Adopted; Passed Third Reading. Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none.  Noes, 0 (none).  Excused, 0 (none).  Transmitted to House.
S: One Day Notice 04-08-25.
S: Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1686) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading.

S: The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED.  The votes in WAM were as follows: 12 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Moriwaki, Aquino, Elefante, Hashimoto, Inouye, Kanuha, Kidani, Kim, Lee, C., Wakai, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) DeCoite.
S: The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 04-01-25 10:01AM; Conference Room 211 & Videoconference.
S: Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
S: Reported from JDC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1165) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.

S: The committee(s) on  JDC recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The votes in JDC were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Rhoads, Gabbard, Chang, San Buenaventura; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Awa; and 0 Excused: none.
S: The committee(s) on JDC deferred the measure until 03-14-25 10:00AM; Conference Room 016 & Videoconference.
S: The committee(s) on JDC has scheduled a public hearing on 03-13-25 9:45AM; Conference Room 016 & Videoconference.
S: Referred to JDC, WAM.
S: Passed First Reading.
S: Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 316).

H: Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Garcia voting no (1) and Representative(s) Belatti, Pierick, Ward excused (3).  Transmitted to Senate.
H: Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday,  03-04-25.
H: Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1146) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.

H: The committee on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 13 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamashita, Takenouchi, Grandinetti, Holt, Hussey, Keohokapu-Lee Loy, Kitagawa, Lamosao, Lee, M., Miyake, Morikawa, Templo, Alcos; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Kusch, Reyes Oda, Ward.
H: Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Tuesday, 02-25-25 12:00PM in House conference room 308 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

H: Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Cochran, Matayoshi, Poepoe, Ward excused (4).
H: Reported from JHA (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 686) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.

H: The committee on JHA recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 10 Ayes: Representative(s) Tarnas, Poepoe, Belatti, Hashem, Kahaloa, Perruso, Takayama, Todd, Garcia, Shimizu; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Cochran.
H: Bill scheduled to be heard by JHA on Wednesday, 02-12-25 2:00PM in House conference room 325 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.
H: Referred to JHA, FIN, referral sheet 3
H: Introduced and Pass First Reading.
H: Pending introduction.
